sqlReaderQuery.value: select CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), max(idr_load_date), 112)  as max_idr_load_date from base_shipments

oracleReaderQuery.value:
select count(*) as idr_record_count
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_billing ship join clxbw.apo_bw_d_material mat on ship.material_num=mat.material_num
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd') > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date}
and (mat.division_name like '%Litter%' or mat.division_name like '%Charcoal%' or mat.division_name like '%Food Products%')

select *
from clxbw.apo_bw_b_billing ship join clxbw.apo_bw_d_material mat on ship.material_num=mat.material_num
where to_char(load_date,'yyyymmdd') > @{activity('Get Last Load Date').output.firstRow.max_idr_load_date}
and (mat.division_name like '%Litter%' or mat.division_name like '%Charcoal%' or mat.division_name like '%Food Products%')

parameters.Subject: Azure DF error
parameters.Activity: QC Check - Copy IDR To Storage
parameters.ErrorMessage: Record counts between IDR and storage file didn't match, please take a look.

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as staging_record_count from stg_shipments

staging did not match, please take a look.

parameters.Subject: ADF pipeline Load IDR Litter Shipments finished successfully
